column4: Is there a way to revert back to packages and setting installed a day ago?
uhm not really unless yo uhave a backup
ok, any idea why my wireless would randomly stop working
? does it see the wireless card
not anymore, the wireless light isnt on and it doesnt find it in the ubuntu interface.  It worked, but I ran updates and such now it doesnt work
i think intel broadcom but not sure --- easy way to check?
00:16.0 Communication controller: Intel Corporation 5 Series/3400 Series Chipset HECI Controller (rev 06)
is it a usb wireless card?
pastebin lspci then and i'll find it
is that a custom pc if not what's the name/model
ill give it a try, thanks
